mapper.select: SELECT cr.id , notice , cr.type , room_name AS "name" , max(cms.send_date) AS "last_chatting" , last_connect , join_date FROM chatroom cr INNER JOIN chat_member cm ON cr.id = cm.chatroom_id LEFT JOIN chat_message cms ON cms.chatroom_id = cr.id WHERE cm.employee_id=#{reqId} AND cr.id=#{chatroomId}
SELECT cr.id , cr.notice , cr.type , NVL(cm.room_name, cr.default_name) FROM chatroom cr INNER JOIN chat_member cm ON cr.id = cm.chatroom_id WHERE cm.employee_id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_member(chatroom_id, employee_id, room_name) VALUES (#{chatroom.id}, #{id}, #{chatroom.name})
INSERT INTO chat_message(id, chatroom_id, employee_id, type, send_date, content) VALUES (#{id}, #{chatroomId}, #{senderId}, #{type}, #{sendDate}, #{content})
